ðŸ“– Summary: Dockle is a container image linter focused on security and best practices. It helps developers build secure and compliant Docker images by identifying potential vulnerabilities and ensuring adherence to CIS Benchmarks. Dockle is designed for easy integration into CI/CD pipelines, enabling automated security audits.
